name: The Mustache Bandit
description:
The Mustache Bandit must commit crimes at all costs, including vandalism. In this mustache slinger prototype, help the bandit vandalize the Mona Lisa with mustaches. 

Shoot carefully as you only get one shot. It's a bit tricky and requires some practice. The longer you hold, the greater the launch force. Let go and watch the mustache fly!

LEFT-CLICK to shoot

R to restart
